description.@en: Some folks inherit this disease. As for me, something just never sat right after I got looked after by a Barber. I tend to sputter blood when things go amiss.

data.notes: Grievous Injuries must undergo a successful Perform Surgery within twenty-four hours of suffering it, or else a character gains its related Permanent Injury.

effect.@en: Whenever you are treated with the Heal Skill, a caregiver suffers an additional -20% Base Chance unless they expend an additional bandage during treatment.
